pr_title: Make sure that Flyway resources are only processed once

timeline.message:
Make sure that Flyway resources are only processed once

Fixes: #10215

timeline.author: sirAlexander

replies.bodyText: Yeah, because we do resource discovery at build time we need this to avoid duplicated being passed to Flyway
replies.author: geoand

replies.bodyText: Will this fix make it into 1.5.3?
replies.author: sirAlexander

replies.bodyText:
There won't be a 1.5.3 most likely. It should hopefully be in the upcoming 1.6.0.CR1.
cc @gsmet
replies.author: geoand

replies.bodyText: Should be in a few days
replies.author: geoand
